feature: Add Message Filtering Methods to Conversation
description: Extend Conversation with additional filter methods beyond MessagesWithHiddenStates: MessagesByRole(role), MessagesByAgent(agentID), MessagesSince(time), MessagesWithMetadata(key). These enable richer conversation analysis.

phases.name: Core Filter Methods
phases.description: Implement the four new filtering methods on Conversation following the existing thread-safe pattern

subtasks.title: Implement MessagesByRole method
subtasks.description: Add MessagesByRole(role MessageRole) []*Message method to filter messages by their role (system, user, assistant, tool). Follow the thread-safe pattern: RLock, iterate, append matches, return copy.
subtasks.notes: Implemented MessagesByRole(role MessageRole) []*Message method following the thread-safe pattern (RLock, iterate, append matches, return copy). Committed as 84d6acd.

subtasks.title: Implement MessagesByAgent method
subtasks.description: Add MessagesByAgent(agentID string) []*Message method to filter messages by agent ID. Handle empty agentID gracefully - match only messages with matching agentID.

subtasks.title: Implement MessagesSince method
subtasks.description: Add MessagesSince(since time.Time) []*Message method to filter messages with Timestamp strictly after the given time. Return messages in chronological order (as stored).

subtasks.title: Implement MessagesWithMetadata method
subtasks.description: Add MessagesWithMetadata(key string) []*Message method to filter messages that have the specified key present in their Metadata map (regardless of value).

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Add comprehensive unit tests for all new filter methods

subtasks.title: Create conversation_test.go with filter method tests
subtasks.description: Create Yarn/conversation_test.go with tests for all four new methods. Include edge cases: empty conversations, no matches, all matches, nil Metadata maps, concurrent access patterns.

subtasks.title: Run tests and verify all pass
subtasks.description: Run go test ./Yarn/... to ensure all tests pass and methods work correctly.

phases.name: Verification
phases.description: Ensure code quality and thread safety

subtasks.title: Run go vet and ensure no issues
subtasks.description: Run go vet ./Yarn/... to check for code issues

subtasks.title: Verify thread safety with race detector
subtasks.description: Run go test -race ./Yarn/... to verify thread safety of new methods

final_acceptance: All four filter methods implemented following existing pattern
Unit tests pass for all methods
